title: Language Project-Based Learning Design Utilizing Narrative Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational financial concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: A language education course conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, with continuous assessment of learning engagement and competency growth through formative evaluations

learning_goals: Learners enhance language expression and communication skills through narrative-based instructional methods.
Learners acquire language proficiency related to financial literacy through storytelling-based project execution.
Learners develop self-directed learning strategies through peer feedback and reflective activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
